00040 /* use so valgrinds memcheck alerts us when undefined index is used.
00041  * TESTING ONLY! */
00042 // #define USE_DEBUG_INDEX_MEMCHECK
00043 
00044 #ifdef USE_DEBUG_INDEX_MEMCHECK
00045 #define DEBUG_MEMCHECK_INDEX_INVALIDATE(ele)               \
00046     {                                                      \
00047         int undef_idx;                                     \
00048         BM_elem_index_set(ele, undef_idx); /* set_ok_invalid */  \
00049     }                                                      \

00056 BMVert *BM_vert_create(BMesh *bm, const float co[3], const BMVert *example)
00057 {
00058     BMVert *v = BLI_mempool_calloc(bm->vpool);
00059 
00060 #ifdef USE_DEBUG_INDEX_MEMCHECK
00061     DEBUG_MEMCHECK_INDEX_INVALIDATE(v)
00062 #else
00063     BM_elem_index_set(v, -1); /* set_ok_invalid */
00064 #endif
00065 
00066     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_VERT; /* may add to middle of the pool */
00067 
00068     bm->totvert++;
00069 
00070     v->head.htype = BM_VERT;
00071 
00072     /* 'v->no' is handled by BM_elem_attrs_copy */
00073     if (co) {
00074         copy_v3_v3(v->co, co);
00075     }
00076 
00077     /* allocate flag */
00078     v->oflags = BLI_mempool_calloc(bm->toolflagpool);
00079 
00080     CustomData_bmesh_set_default(&bm->vdata, &v->head.data);
00081     
00082     if (example) {
00083         BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, example, v);
00084     }
00085 
00086     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(v);
00087 
00088     return v;
00089 }

00097 BMEdge *BM_edge_create(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2, const BMEdge *example, int nodouble)
00098 {
00099     BMEdge *e;
00100     
00101     if (nodouble && (e = BM_edge_exists(v1, v2)))
00102         return e;
00103     
00104     e = BLI_mempool_calloc(bm->epool);
00105 
00106 #ifdef USE_DEBUG_INDEX_MEMCHECK
00107     DEBUG_MEMCHECK_INDEX_INVALIDATE(e)
00108 #else
00109     BM_elem_index_set(e, -1); /* set_ok_invalid */
00110 #endif
00111 
00112     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_EDGE; /* may add to middle of the pool */
00113 
00114     bm->totedge++;
00115 
00116     e->head.htype = BM_EDGE;
00117     
00118     /* allocate flag */
00119     e->oflags = BLI_mempool_calloc(bm->toolflagpool);
00120 
00121     e->v1 = v1;
00122     e->v2 = v2;
00123     
00124     BM_elem_flag_enable(e, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
00125     
00126     CustomData_bmesh_set_default(&bm->edata, &e->head.data);
00127     
00128     bmesh_disk_edge_append(e, e->v1);
00129     bmesh_disk_edge_append(e, e->v2);
00130     
00131     if (example)
00132         BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, example, e);
00133     
00134     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(e);
00135 
00136     return e;
00137 }

00139 static BMLoop *bm_loop_create(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v, BMEdge *e, BMFace *f, const BMLoop *example)
00140 {
00141     BMLoop *l = NULL;
00142 
00143     l = BLI_mempool_calloc(bm->lpool);
00144     l->next = l->prev = NULL;
00145     l->v = v;
00146     l->e = e;
00147     l->f = f;
00148     l->radial_next = l->radial_prev = NULL;
00149     l->head.data = NULL;
00150     l->head.htype = BM_LOOP;
00151 
00152     bm->totloop++;
00153 
00154     if (example) {
00155         CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&bm->ldata, &bm->ldata, example->head.data, &l->head.data);
00156     }
00157     else {
00158         CustomData_bmesh_set_default(&bm->ldata, &l->head.data);
00159     }
00160 
00161     return l;
00162 }

00164 static BMLoop *bm_face_boundary_add(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, BMVert *startv, BMEdge *starte)
00165 {
00166 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00167     BMLoopList *lst = BLI_mempool_calloc(bm->looplistpool);
00168 #endif
00169     BMLoop *l = bm_loop_create(bm, startv, starte, f, NULL);
00170     
00171     bmesh_radial_append(starte, l);
00172 
00173 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00174     lst->first = lst->last = l;
00175     BLI_addtail(&f->loops, lst);
00176 #else
00177     f->l_first = l;
00178 #endif
00179 
00180     l->f = f;
00181     
00182     return l;
00183 }

00185 BMFace *BM_face_copy(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, const short copyverts, const short copyedges)
00186 {
00187     BMEdge **edges = NULL;
00188     BMVert **verts = NULL;
00189     BLI_array_staticdeclare(edges, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00190     BLI_array_staticdeclare(verts, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00191     BMLoop *l_iter;
00192     BMLoop *l_first;
00193     BMLoop *l_copy;
00194     BMFace *f_copy;
00195     int i;
00196 
00197     /* BMESH_TODO - grow verts array in one go! (right here) */
00198     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00199     do {
00200         if (copyverts) {
00201             BMVert *v = BM_vert_create(bm, l_iter->v->co, l_iter->v);
00202             BLI_array_append(verts, v);
00203         }
00204         else {
00205             BLI_array_append(verts, l_iter->v);
00206         }
00207     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00208 
00209     /* BMESH_TODO - grow edges array in one go! (right here) */
00210     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00211     i = 0;
00212     do {
00213         if (copyedges) {
00214             BMEdge *e;
00215             BMVert *v1, *v2;
00216             
00217             if (l_iter->e->v1 == verts[i]) {
00218                 v1 = verts[i];
00219                 v2 = verts[(i + 1) % f->len];
00220             }
00221             else {
00222                 v2 = verts[i];
00223                 v1 = verts[(i + 1) % f->len];
00224             }
00225             
00226             e = BM_edge_create(bm,  v1, v2, l_iter->e, FALSE);
00227             BLI_array_append(edges, e);
00228         }
00229         else {
00230             BLI_array_append(edges, l_iter->e);
00231         }
00232         
00233         i++;
00234     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00235     
00236     f_copy = BM_face_create(bm, verts, edges, f->len, FALSE);
00237     
00238     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, f, f_copy);
00239     
00240     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00241     l_copy = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f_copy);
00242     do {
00243         BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l_iter, l_copy);
00244         l_copy = l_copy->next;
00245     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00246     
00247     return f_copy;
00248 }

00255 {
00256     BMFace *f;
00257 
00258     f = BLI_mempool_calloc(bm->fpool);
00259 
00260 #ifdef USE_DEBUG_INDEX_MEMCHECK
00261     DEBUG_MEMCHECK_INDEX_INVALIDATE(f)
00262 #else
00263     BM_elem_index_set(f, -1); /* set_ok_invalid */
00264 #endif
00265 
00266     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_FACE; /* may add to middle of the pool */
00267 
00268     bm->totface++;
00269 
00270     f->head.htype = BM_FACE;
00271 
00272     /* allocate flag */
00273     f->oflags = BLI_mempool_calloc(bm->toolflagpool);
00274 
00275     CustomData_bmesh_set_default(&bm->pdata, &f->head.data);
00276 
00277 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00278     f->totbounds = 0;
00279 #endif
00280 
00281     return f;
00282 }

00287 BMFace *BM_face_create(BMesh *bm, BMVert **verts, BMEdge **edges, const int len, int nodouble)
00288 {
00289     BMFace *f = NULL;
00290     BMLoop *l, *startl, *lastl;
00291     int i, overlap;
00292     
00293     if (len == 0) {
00294         /* just return NULL for no */
00295         return NULL;
00296     }
00297 
00298     if (nodouble) {
00299         /* Check if face already exists */
00300         overlap = BM_face_exists(bm, verts, len, &f);
00301         if (overlap) {
00302             return f;
00303         }
00304         else {
00305             BLI_assert(f == NULL);
00306         }
00307     }
00308 
00309     f = bm_face_create__internal(bm);
00310 
00311     startl = lastl = bm_face_boundary_add(bm, f, verts[0], edges[0]);
00312     
00313     startl->v = verts[0];
00314     startl->e = edges[0];
00315     for (i = 1; i < len; i++) {
00316         l = bm_loop_create(bm, verts[i], edges[i], f, edges[i]->l);
00317         
00318         l->f = f;
00319         bmesh_radial_append(edges[i], l);
00320 
00321         l->prev = lastl;
00322         lastl->next = l;
00323         lastl = l;
00324     }
00325     
00326     startl->prev = lastl;
00327     lastl->next = startl;
00328     
00329     f->len = len;
00330     
00331     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(f);
00332 
00333     return f;
00334 }
00335 
00342 int bmesh_elem_check(void *element, const char htype)
00343 {
00344     BMHeader *head = element;
00345     int err = 0;
00346 
00347     if (!element)
00348         return 1;
00349 
00350     if (head->htype != htype)
00351         return 2;
00352     
00353     switch (htype) {
00354         case BM_VERT: {
00355             BMVert *v = element;
00356             if (v->e && v->e->head.htype != BM_EDGE) {
00357                 err |= 4;
00358             }
00359             break;
00360         }
00361         case BM_EDGE: {
00362             BMEdge *e = element;
00363             if (e->l && e->l->head.htype != BM_LOOP)
00364                 err |= 8;
00365             if (e->l && e->l->f->head.htype != BM_FACE)
00366                 err |= 16;
00367             if (e->v1_disk_link.prev == NULL ||
00368                 e->v2_disk_link.prev == NULL ||
00369                 e->v1_disk_link.next == NULL ||
00370                 e->v2_disk_link.next == NULL)
00371             {
00372                 err |= 32;
00373             }
00374             if (e->l && (e->l->radial_next == NULL || e->l->radial_prev == NULL))
00375                 err |= 64;
00376             if (e->l && e->l->f->len <= 0)
00377                 err |= 128;
00378             break;
00379         }
00380         case BM_LOOP: {
00381             BMLoop *l = element, *l2;
00382             int i;
00383 
00384             if (l->f->head.htype != BM_FACE)
00385                 err |= 256;
00386             if (l->e->head.htype != BM_EDGE)
00387                 err |= 512;
00388             if (l->v->head.htype !=  BM_VERT)
00389                 err |= 1024;
00390             if (!BM_vert_in_edge(l->e, l->v)) {
00391                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: fatal bmesh error (vert not in edge)! (bmesh internal error)\n", __func__);
00392                 err |= 2048;
00393             }
00394 
00395             if (l->radial_next == NULL || l->radial_prev == NULL)
00396                 err |= (1 << 12);
00397             if (l->f->len <= 0)
00398                 err |= (1 << 13);
00399 
00400             /* validate boundary loop -- invalid for hole loops, of course,
00401              * but we won't be allowing those for a while yet */
00402             l2 = l;
00403             i = 0;
00404             do {
00405                 if (i >= BM_NGON_MAX) {
00406                     break;
00407                 }
00408 
00409                 i++;
00410             } while ((l2 = l2->next) != l);
00411 
00412             if (i != l->f->len || l2 != l)
00413                 err |= (1 << 14);
00414 
00415             if (!bmesh_radial_validate(bmesh_radial_length(l), l))
00416                 err |= (1 << 15);
00417 
00418             break;
00419         }
00420         case BM_FACE: {
00421             BMFace *f = element;
00422             BMLoop *l_iter;
00423             BMLoop *l_first;
00424             int len = 0;
00425 
00426 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00427             if (!f->loops.first)
00428 #else
00429             if (!f->l_first)
00430 #endif
00431             {
00432                 err |= (1 << 16);
00433             }
00434             l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00435             do {
00436                 if (l_iter->f != f) {
00437                     fprintf(stderr, "%s: loop inside one face points to another! (bmesh internal error)\n", __func__);
00438                     err |= (1 << 17);
00439                 }
00440 
00441                 if (!l_iter->e)
00442                     err |= (1 << 18);
00443                 if (!l_iter->v)
00444                     err |= (1 << 19);
00445                 if (!BM_vert_in_edge(l_iter->e, l_iter->v) || !BM_vert_in_edge(l_iter->e, l_iter->next->v)) {
00446                     err |= (1 << 20);
00447                 }
00448 
00449                 if (!bmesh_radial_validate(bmesh_radial_length(l_iter), l_iter))
00450                     err |= (1 << 21);
00451 
00452                 if (!bmesh_disk_count(l_iter->v) || !bmesh_disk_count(l_iter->next->v))
00453                     err |= (1 << 22);
00454 
00455                 len++;
00456             } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00457 
00458             if (len != f->len)
00459                 err |= (1 << 23);
00460         }
00461     }
00462 
00463     BMESH_ASSERT(err == 0);
00464 
00465     return err;
00466 }

00472 static void bm_kill_only_vert(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v)
00473 {
00474     bm->totvert--;
00475     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_VERT;
00476 
00477     BM_select_history_remove(bm, v);
00478 
00479     if (v->head.data)
00480         CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&bm->vdata, &v->head.data);
00481 
00482     BLI_mempool_free(bm->toolflagpool, v->oflags);
00483     BLI_mempool_free(bm->vpool, v);
00484 }
00485 
00490 static void bm_kill_only_edge(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *e)
00491 {
00492     bm->totedge--;
00493     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_EDGE;
00494 
00495     BM_select_history_remove(bm, (BMElem *)e);
00496 
00497     if (e->head.data)
00498         CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&bm->edata, &e->head.data);
00499 
00500     BLI_mempool_free(bm->toolflagpool, e->oflags);
00501     BLI_mempool_free(bm->epool, e);
00502 }
00503 
00508 static void bm_kill_only_face(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f)
00509 {
00510     if (bm->act_face == f)
00511         bm->act_face = NULL;
00512 
00513     bm->totface--;
00514     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_FACE;
00515 
00516     BM_select_history_remove(bm, (BMElem *)f);
00517 
00518     if (f->head.data)
00519         CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&bm->pdata, &f->head.data);
00520 
00521     BLI_mempool_free(bm->toolflagpool, f->oflags);
00522     BLI_mempool_free(bm->fpool, f);
00523 }
00524 
00529 static void bm_kill_only_loop(BMesh *bm, BMLoop *l)
00530 {
00531     bm->totloop--;
00532     if (l->head.data)
00533         CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&bm->ldata, &l->head.data);
00534 
00535     BLI_mempool_free(bm->lpool, l);
00536 }

00542 void BM_face_edges_kill(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f)
00543 {
00544     BMEdge **edges = NULL;
00545     BLI_array_staticdeclare(edges, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00546     BMLoop *l_iter;
00547     BMLoop *l_first;
00548     int i;
00549     
00550     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00551     do {
00552         BLI_array_append(edges, l_iter->e);
00553     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00554     
00555     for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(edges); i++) {
00556         BM_edge_kill(bm, edges[i]);
00557     }
00558     
00559     BLI_array_free(edges);
00560 }
00561 
00566 void BM_face_verts_kill(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f)
00567 {
00568     BMVert **verts = NULL;
00569     BLI_array_staticdeclare(verts, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00570     BMLoop *l_iter;
00571     BMLoop *l_first;
00572     int i;
00573     
00574     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00575     do {
00576         BLI_array_append(verts, l_iter->v);
00577     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00578     
00579     for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(verts); i++) {
00580         BM_vert_kill(bm, verts[i]);
00581     }
00582     
00583     BLI_array_free(verts);
00584 }
00585 
00586 void BM_face_kill(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f)
00587 {
00588 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00589     BMLoopList *ls, *ls_next;
00590 #endif
00591 
00592     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(f);
00593 
00594 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00595     for (ls = f->loops.first; ls; ls = ls_next)
00596 #else
00597     if (f->l_first)
00598 #endif
00599     {
00600         BMLoop *l_iter, *l_next, *l_first;
00601 
00602 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00603         ls_next = ls->next;
00604         l_iter = l_first = ls->first;
00605 #else
00606         l_iter = l_first = f->l_first;
00607 #endif
00608 
00609         do {
00610             l_next = l_iter->next;
00611 
00612             bmesh_radial_loop_remove(l_iter, l_iter->e);
00613             bm_kill_only_loop(bm, l_iter);
00614 
00615         } while ((l_iter = l_next) != l_first);
00616 
00617 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00618         BLI_mempool_free(bm->looplistpool, ls);
00619 #endif
00620     }
00621 
00622     bm_kill_only_face(bm, f);
00623 }
00627 void BM_edge_kill(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *e)
00628 {
00629 
00630     bmesh_disk_edge_remove(e, e->v1);
00631     bmesh_disk_edge_remove(e, e->v2);
00632 
00633     if (e->l) {
00634         BMLoop *l = e->l, *lnext, *startl = e->l;
00635 
00636         do {
00637             lnext = l->radial_next;
00638             if (lnext->f == l->f) {
00639                 BM_face_kill(bm, l->f);
00640                 break;
00641             }
00642             
00643             BM_face_kill(bm, l->f);
00644 
00645             if (l == lnext)
00646                 break;
00647             l = lnext;
00648         } while (l != startl);
00649     }
00650     
00651     bm_kill_only_edge(bm, e);
00652 }
00653 
00657 void BM_vert_kill(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v)
00658 {
00659     if (v->e) {
00660         BMEdge *e, *nexte;
00661         
00662         e = v->e;
00663         while (v->e) {
00664             nexte = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e, v);
00665             BM_edge_kill(bm, e);
00666             e = nexte;
00667         }
00668     }
00669 
00670     bm_kill_only_vert(bm, v);
00671 }

00673 /********** private disk and radial cycle functions ********** */
00674 
00675 static int bm_loop_length(BMLoop *l)
00676 {
00677     BMLoop *l_first = l;
00678     int i = 0;
00679 
00680     do {
00681         i++;
00682     } while ((l = l->next) != l_first);
00683 
00684     return i;
00685 }

00698 static int bm_loop_reverse_loop(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f
00699 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00700                                 , BMLoopList *lst
00701 #endif
00702                                 )
00703 {
00704 
00705 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00706     BMLoop *l_first = lst->first;
00707 #else
00708     BMLoop *l_first = f->l_first;
00709 #endif
00710 
00711     BMLoop *l_iter, *oldprev, *oldnext;
00712     BMEdge **edar = NULL;
00713     MDisps *md;
00714     BLI_array_staticdeclare(edar, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00715     int i, j, edok, len = 0, do_disps = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->ldata, CD_MDISPS);
00716 
00717     len = bm_loop_length(l_first);
00718 
00719     for (i = 0, l_iter = l_first; i < len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next) {
00720         BMEdge *curedge = l_iter->e;
00721         bmesh_radial_loop_remove(l_iter, curedge);
00722         BLI_array_append(edar, curedge);
00723     }
00724 
00725     /* actually reverse the loop */
00726     for (i = 0, l_iter = l_first; i < len; i++) {
00727         oldnext = l_iter->next;
00728         oldprev = l_iter->prev;
00729         l_iter->next = oldprev;
00730         l_iter->prev = oldnext;
00731         l_iter = oldnext;
00732         
00733         if (do_disps) {
00734             float (*co)[3];
00735             int x, y, sides;
00736             
00737             md = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l_iter->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00738             if (!md->totdisp || !md->disps)
00739                 continue;
00740 
00741             sides = (int)sqrt(md->totdisp);
00742             co = md->disps;
00743             
00744             for (x = 0; x < sides; x++) {
00745                 for (y = 0; y < x; y++) {
00746                     swap_v3_v3(co[y * sides + x], co[sides * x + y]);
00747                 }
00748             }
00749         }
00750     }
00751 
00752     if (len == 2) { /* two edged face */
00753         /* do some verification here! */
00754         l_first->e = edar[1];
00755         l_first->next->e = edar[0];
00756     }
00757     else {
00758         for (i = 0, l_iter = l_first; i < len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next) {
00759             edok = 0;
00760             for (j = 0; j < len; j++) {
00761                 edok = bmesh_verts_in_edge(l_iter->v, l_iter->next->v, edar[j]);
00762                 if (edok) {
00763                     l_iter->e = edar[j];
00764                     break;
00765                 }
00766             }
00767         }
00768     }
00769     /* rebuild radia */
00770     for (i = 0, l_iter = l_first; i < len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next)
00771         bmesh_radial_append(l_iter->e, l_iter);
00772 
00773     /* validate radia */
00774     for (i = 0, l_iter = l_first; i < len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next) {
00775         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l_iter);
00776         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l_iter->e);
00777         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l_iter->v);
00778         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l_iter->f);
00779     }
00780 
00781     BLI_array_free(edar);
00782 
00783     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(f);
00784 
00785     return 1;
00786 }
00787 
00791 int bmesh_loop_reverse(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f)
00792 {
00793 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00794     return bmesh_loop_reverse_loop(bm, f, f->loops.first);
00795 #else
00796     return bm_loop_reverse_loop(bm, f);
00797 #endif
00798 }
00799 
00800 static void bm_elements_systag_enable(void *veles, int tot, int flag)
00801 {
00802     BMHeader **eles = veles;
00803     int i;
00804 
00805     for (i = 0; i < tot; i++) {
00806         BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_ENABLE((BMElemF *)eles[i], flag);
00807     }
00808 }
00809 
00810 static void bm_elements_systag_disable(void *veles, int tot, int flag)
00811 {
00812     BMHeader **eles = veles;
00813     int i;
00814 
00815     for (i = 0; i < tot; i++) {
00816         BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_DISABLE((BMElemF *)eles[i], flag);
00817     }
00818 }
00819 
00820 #define FACE_MARK  (1 << 10)
00821 
00822 static int count_flagged_radial(BMesh *bm, BMLoop *l, int flag)
00823 {
00824     BMLoop *l2 = l;
00825     int i = 0, c = 0;
00826 
00827     do {
00828         if (UNLIKELY(!l2)) {
00829             BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00830             goto error;
00831         }
00832         
00833         i += BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_TEST(l2->f, flag) ? 1 : 0;
00834         l2 = l2->radial_next;
00835         if (UNLIKELY(c >= BM_LOOP_RADIAL_MAX)) {
00836             BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00837             goto error;
00838         }
00839         c++;
00840     } while (l2 != l);
00841 
00842     return i;
00843 
00844 error:
00845     BMO_error_raise(bm, bm->currentop, BMERR_MESH_ERROR, NULL);
00846     return 0;
00847 }
00848 
00849 static int UNUSED_FUNCTION(count_flagged_disk)(BMVert *v, int flag)
00850 {
00851     BMEdge *e = v->e;
00852     int i = 0;
00853 
00854     if (!e)
00855         return 0;
00856 
00857     do {
00858         i += BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_TEST(e, flag) ? 1 : 0;
00859     } while ((e = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e, v)) != v->e);
00860 
00861     return i;
00862 }
00863 
00864 static int disk_is_flagged(BMVert *v, int flag)
00865 {
00866     BMEdge *e = v->e;
00867 
00868     if (!e)
00869         return FALSE;
00870 
00871     do {
00872         BMLoop *l = e->l;
00873 
00874         if (!l) {
00875             return FALSE;
00876         }
00877         
00878         if (bmesh_radial_length(l) == 1)
00879             return FALSE;
00880         
00881         do {
00882             if (!BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_TEST(l->f, flag))
00883                 return FALSE;
00884 
00885             l = l->radial_next;
00886         } while (l != e->l);
00887 
00888         e = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e, v);
00889     } while (e != v->e);
00890 
00891     return TRUE;
00892 }
00893 
00894 /* Mid-level Topology Manipulation Functions */
00895 
00910 BMFace *BM_faces_join(BMesh *bm, BMFace **faces, int totface, const short do_del)
00911 {
00912     BMFace *f, *newf;
00913 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00914     BMLoopList *lst;
00915     ListBase holes = {NULL, NULL};
00916 #endif
00917     BMLoop *l_iter;
00918     BMLoop *l_first;
00919     BMEdge **edges = NULL;
00920     BMEdge **deledges = NULL;
00921     BMVert **delverts = NULL;
00922     BLI_array_staticdeclare(edges,    BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00923     BLI_array_staticdeclare(deledges, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00924     BLI_array_staticdeclare(delverts, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00925     BMVert *v1 = NULL, *v2 = NULL;
00926     const char *err = NULL;
00927     int i, tote = 0;
00928 
00929     if (UNLIKELY(!totface)) {
00930         BMESH_ASSERT(0);
00931         return NULL;
00932     }
00933 
00934     if (totface == 1)
00935         return faces[0];
00936 
00937     bm_elements_systag_enable(faces, totface, _FLAG_JF);
00938 
00939     for (i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
00940         f = faces[i];
00941         l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00942         do {
00943             int rlen = count_flagged_radial(bm, l_iter, _FLAG_JF);
00944 
00945             if (rlen > 2) {
00946                 err = "Input faces do not form a contiguous manifold region";
00947                 goto error;
00948             }
00949             else if (rlen == 1) {
00950                 BLI_array_append(edges, l_iter->e);
00951 
00952                 if (!v1) {
00953                     v1 = l_iter->v;
00954                     v2 = BM_edge_other_vert(l_iter->e, l_iter->v);
00955                 }
00956                 tote++;
00957             }
00958             else if (rlen == 2) {
00959                 int d1, d2;
00960 
00961                 d1 = disk_is_flagged(l_iter->e->v1, _FLAG_JF);
00962                 d2 = disk_is_flagged(l_iter->e->v2, _FLAG_JF);
00963 
00964                 if (!d1 && !d2 && !BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_TEST(l_iter->e, _FLAG_JF)) {
00965                     /* don't remove an edge it makes up the side of another face
00966                      * else this will remove the face as well - campbell */
00967                     if (BM_edge_face_count(l_iter->e) <= 2) {
00968                         if (do_del) {
00969                             BLI_array_append(deledges, l_iter->e);
00970                         }
00971                         BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_ENABLE(l_iter->e, _FLAG_JF);
00972                     }
00973                 }
00974                 else {
00975                     if (d1 && !BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_TEST(l_iter->e->v1, _FLAG_JF)) {
00976                         if (do_del) {
00977                             BLI_array_append(delverts, l_iter->e->v1);
00978                         }
00979                         BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_ENABLE(l_iter->e->v1, _FLAG_JF);
00980                     }
00981 
00982                     if (d2 && !BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_TEST(l_iter->e->v2, _FLAG_JF)) {
00983                         if (do_del) {
00984                             BLI_array_append(delverts, l_iter->e->v2);
00985                         }
00986                         BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_ENABLE(l_iter->e->v2, _FLAG_JF);
00987                     }
00988                 }
00989             }
00990         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00991 
00992 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00993         for (lst = f->loops.first; lst; lst = lst->next) {
00994             if (lst == f->loops.first) {
00995                 continue;
00996             }
00997 
00998             BLI_remlink(&f->loops, lst);
00999             BLI_addtail(&holes, lst);
01000         }
01001 #endif
01002 
01003     }
01004 
01005     /* create region face */
01006     newf = BM_face_create_ngon(bm, v1, v2, edges, tote, FALSE);
01007     if (!newf || BMO_error_occurred(bm)) {
01008         if (!BMO_error_occurred(bm))
01009             err = "Invalid boundary region to join faces";
01010         goto error;
01011     }
01012 
01013     /* copy over loop data */
01014     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(newf);
01015     do {
01016         BMLoop *l2 = l_iter->radial_next;
01017 
01018         do {
01019             if (BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_TEST(l2->f, _FLAG_JF))
01020                 break;
01021             l2 = l2->radial_next;
01022         } while (l2 != l_iter);
01023 
01024         if (l2 != l_iter) {
01025             /* I think this is correct */
01026             if (l2->v != l_iter->v) {
01027                 l2 = l2->next;
01028             }
01029 
01030             BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, l2, l_iter);
01031         }
01032     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
01033     
01034     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, faces[0], newf);
01035 
01036 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01037     /* add hole */
01038     BLI_movelisttolist(&newf->loops, &holes);
01039 #endif
01040 
01041     /* update loop face pointer */
01042 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01043     for (lst = newf->loops.first; lst; lst = lst->next)
01044 #endif
01045     {
01046 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01047         l_iter = l_first = lst->first;
01048 #else
01049         l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(newf);
01050 #endif
01051         do {
01052             l_iter->f = newf;
01053         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
01054     }
01055 
01056     bm_elements_systag_disable(faces, totface, _FLAG_JF);
01057     BM_ELEM_API_FLAG_DISABLE(newf, _FLAG_JF);
01058 
01059     /* handle multi-res data */
01060     if (CustomData_has_layer(&bm->ldata, CD_MDISPS)) {
01061         l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(newf);
01062         do {
01063             for (i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
01064                 BM_loop_interp_multires(bm, l_iter, faces[i]);
01065             }
01066         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
01067     }
01068 
01069     /* delete old geometry */
01070     if (do_del) {
01071         for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(deledges); i++) {
01072             BM_edge_kill(bm, deledges[i]);
01073         }
01074 
01075         for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(delverts); i++) {
01076             BM_vert_kill(bm, delverts[i]);
01077         }
01078     }
01079     else {
01080         /* otherwise we get both old and new faces */
01081         for (i = 0; i < totface; i++) {
01082             BM_face_kill(bm, faces[i]);
01083         }
01084     }
01085     
01086     BLI_array_free(edges);
01087     BLI_array_free(deledges);
01088     BLI_array_free(delverts);
01089 
01090     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(newf);
01091     return newf;
01092 
01093 error:
01094     bm_elements_systag_disable(faces, totface, _FLAG_JF);
01095     BLI_array_free(edges);
01096     BLI_array_free(deledges);
01097     BLI_array_free(delverts);
01098 
01099     if (err) {
01100         BMO_error_raise(bm, bm->currentop, BMERR_DISSOLVEFACES_FAILED, err);
01101     }
01102     return NULL;
01103 }
01104 
01105 static BMFace *bm_face_create__sfme(BMesh *bm, BMFace *UNUSED(example))
01106 {
01107     BMFace *f;
01108 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01109     BMLoopList *lst;
01110 #endif
01111 
01112     f = bm_face_create__internal(bm);
01113 
01114 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01115     lst = BLI_mempool_calloc(bm->looplistpool);
01116     BLI_addtail(&f->loops, lst);
01117 #endif
01118 
01119 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01120     f->totbounds = 1;
01121 #endif
01122 
01123     return f;
01124 }
01125 
01160 BMFace *bmesh_sfme(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2,
01161                    BMLoop **r_l,
01162 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01163                    ListBase *holes,
01164 #endif
01165                    BMEdge *example,
01166                    const short nodouble
01167                    )
01168 {
01169 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01170     BMLoopList *lst, *lst2;
01171 #endif
01172 
01173     BMFace *f2;
01174     BMLoop *l_iter, *l_first;
01175     BMLoop *v1loop = NULL, *v2loop = NULL, *f1loop = NULL, *f2loop = NULL;
01176     BMEdge *e;
01177     int i, len, f1len, f2len, first_loop_f1;
01178 
01179     /* verify that v1 and v2 are in face */
01180     len = f->len;
01181     for (i = 0, l_iter = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f); i < len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next) {
01182         if (l_iter->v == v1) v1loop = l_iter;
01183         else if (l_iter->v == v2) v2loop = l_iter;
01184     }
01185 
01186     if (!v1loop || !v2loop) {
01187         return NULL;
01188     }
01189 
01190     /* allocate new edge between v1 and v2 */
01191     e = BM_edge_create(bm, v1, v2, example, nodouble);
01192 
01193     f2 = bm_face_create__sfme(bm, f);
01194     f1loop = bm_loop_create(bm, v2, e, f, v2loop);
01195     f2loop = bm_loop_create(bm, v1, e, f2, v1loop);
01196 
01197     f1loop->prev = v2loop->prev;
01198     f2loop->prev = v1loop->prev;
01199     v2loop->prev->next = f1loop;
01200     v1loop->prev->next = f2loop;
01201 
01202     f1loop->next = v1loop;
01203     f2loop->next = v2loop;
01204     v1loop->prev = f1loop;
01205     v2loop->prev = f2loop;
01206 
01207 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01208     lst = f->loops.first;
01209     lst2 = f2->loops.first;
01210 
01211     lst2->first = lst2->last = f2loop;
01212     lst->first = lst->last = f1loop;
01213 #else
01214     /* find which of the faces the original first loop is in */
01215     l_iter = l_first = f1loop;
01216     first_loop_f1 = 0;
01217     do {
01218         if (l_iter == f->l_first)
01219             first_loop_f1 = 1;
01220     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
01221 
01222     if (first_loop_f1) {
01223         /* original first loop was in f1, find a suitable first loop for f2
01224          * which is as similar as possible to f1. the order matters for tools
01225          * such as duplifaces. */
01226         if (f->l_first->prev == f1loop)
01227             f2->l_first = f2loop->prev;
01228         else if (f->l_first->next == f1loop)
01229             f2->l_first = f2loop->next;
01230         else
01231             f2->l_first = f2loop;
01232     }
01233     else {
01234         /* original first loop was in f2, further do same as above */
01235         f2->l_first = f->l_first;
01236 
01237         if (f->l_first->prev == f2loop)
01238             f->l_first = f1loop->prev;
01239         else if (f->l_first->next == f2loop)
01240             f->l_first = f1loop->next;
01241         else
01242             f->l_first = f1loop;
01243     }
01244 #endif
01245 
01246     /* validate both loop */
01247     /* I don't know how many loops are supposed to be in each face at this point! FIXME */
01248 
01249     /* go through all of f2's loops and make sure they point to it properly */
01250     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f2);
01251     f2len = 0;
01252     do {
01253         l_iter->f = f2;
01254         f2len++;
01255     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
01256 
01257     /* link up the new loops into the new edges radial */
01258     bmesh_radial_append(e, f1loop);
01259     bmesh_radial_append(e, f2loop);
01260 
01261     f2->len = f2len;
01262 
01263     f1len = 0;
01264     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
01265     do {
01266         f1len++;
01267     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
01268 
01269     f->len = f1len;
01270 
01271     if (r_l) *r_l = f2loop;
01272 
01273 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
01274     if (holes) {
01275         BLI_movelisttolist(&f2->loops, holes);
01276     }
01277     else {
01278         /* this code is not significant until holes actually work */
01279         //printf("warning: call to split face euler without holes argument; holes will be tossed.\n");
01280         for (lst = f->loops.last; lst != f->loops.first; lst = lst2) {
01281             lst2 = lst->prev;
01282             BLI_mempool_free(bm->looplistpool, lst);
01283         }
01284     }
01285 #endif
01286 
01287     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(e);
01288     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(f);
01289     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(f2);
01290     
01291     return f2;
01292 }
01293 
01311 BMVert *bmesh_semv(BMesh *bm, BMVert *tv, BMEdge *e, BMEdge **r_e)
01312 {
01313     BMLoop *nextl;
01314     BMEdge *ne;
01315     BMVert *nv, *ov;
01316     int i, edok, valence1 = 0, valence2 = 0;
01317 
01318     BLI_assert(bmesh_vert_in_edge(e, tv) != FALSE);
01319 
01320     ov = bmesh_edge_other_vert_get(e, tv);
01321 
01322     valence1 = bmesh_disk_count(ov);
01323 
01324     valence2 = bmesh_disk_count(tv);
01325 
01326     nv = BM_vert_create(bm, tv->co, tv);
01327     ne = BM_edge_create(bm, nv, tv, e, FALSE);
01328 
01329     bmesh_disk_edge_remove(ne, tv);
01330     bmesh_disk_edge_remove(ne, nv);
01331 
01332     /* remove e from tv's disk cycle */
01333     bmesh_disk_edge_remove(e, tv);
01334 
01335     /* swap out tv for nv in e */
01336     bmesh_edge_swapverts(e, tv, nv);
01337 
01338     /* add e to nv's disk cycle */
01339     bmesh_disk_edge_append(e, nv);
01340 
01341     /* add ne to nv's disk cycle */
01342     bmesh_disk_edge_append(ne, nv);
01343 
01344     /* add ne to tv's disk cycle */
01345     bmesh_disk_edge_append(ne, tv);
01346 
01347     /* verify disk cycle */
01348     edok = bmesh_disk_validate(valence1, ov->e, ov);
01349     BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01350     edok = bmesh_disk_validate(valence2, tv->e, tv);
01351     BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01352     edok = bmesh_disk_validate(2, nv->e, nv);
01353     BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01354 
01355     /* Split the radial cycle if present */
01356     nextl = e->l;
01357     e->l = NULL;
01358     if (nextl) {
01359         BMLoop *nl, *l;
01360         int radlen = bmesh_radial_length(nextl);
01361         int first1 = 0, first2 = 0;
01362 
01363         /* Take the next loop. Remove it from radial. Split it. Append to appropriate radials */
01364         while (nextl) {
01365             l = nextl;
01366             l->f->len++;
01367             nextl = nextl != nextl->radial_next ? nextl->radial_next : NULL;
01368             bmesh_radial_loop_remove(l, NULL);
01369 
01370             nl = bm_loop_create(bm, NULL, NULL, l->f, l);
01371             nl->prev = l;
01372             nl->next = (l->next);
01373             nl->prev->next = nl;
01374             nl->next->prev = nl;
01375             nl->v = nv;
01376 
01377             /* assign the correct edge to the correct loop */
01378             if (bmesh_verts_in_edge(nl->v, nl->next->v, e)) {
01379                 nl->e = e;
01380                 l->e = ne;
01381 
01382                 /* append l into ne's rad cycle */
01383                 if (!first1) {
01384                     first1 = 1;
01385                     l->radial_next = l->radial_prev = NULL;
01386                 }
01387 
01388                 if (!first2) {
01389                     first2 = 1;
01390                     l->radial_next = l->radial_prev = NULL;
01391                 }
01392                 
01393                 bmesh_radial_append(nl->e, nl);
01394                 bmesh_radial_append(l->e, l);
01395             }
01396             else if (bmesh_verts_in_edge(nl->v, nl->next->v, ne)) {
01397                 nl->e = ne;
01398                 l->e = e;
01399 
01400                 /* append l into ne's rad cycle */
01401                 if (!first1) {
01402                     first1 = 1;
01403                     l->radial_next = l->radial_prev = NULL;
01404                 }
01405 
01406                 if (!first2) {
01407                     first2 = 1;
01408                     l->radial_next = l->radial_prev = NULL;
01409                 }
01410 
01411                 bmesh_radial_append(nl->e, nl);
01412                 bmesh_radial_append(l->e, l);
01413             }
01414 
01415         }
01416 
01417         /* verify length of radial cycle */
01418         edok = bmesh_radial_validate(radlen, e->l);
01419         BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01420         edok = bmesh_radial_validate(radlen, ne->l);
01421         BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01422 
01423         /* verify loop->v and loop->next->v pointers for e */
01424         for (i = 0, l = e->l; i < radlen; i++, l = l->radial_next) {
01425             BMESH_ASSERT(l->e == e);
01426             //BMESH_ASSERT(l->radial_next == l);
01427             BMESH_ASSERT(!(l->prev->e != ne && l->next->e != ne));
01428 
01429             edok = bmesh_verts_in_edge(l->v, l->next->v, e);
01430             BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01431             BMESH_ASSERT(l->v != l->next->v);
01432             BMESH_ASSERT(l->e != l->next->e);
01433 
01434             /* verify loop cycle for kloop-> */
01435             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l);
01436             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->v);
01437             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->e);
01438             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->f);
01439         }
01440         /* verify loop->v and loop->next->v pointers for ne */
01441         for (i = 0, l = ne->l; i < radlen; i++, l = l->radial_next) {
01442             BMESH_ASSERT(l->e == ne);
01443             // BMESH_ASSERT(l->radial_next == l);
01444             BMESH_ASSERT(!(l->prev->e != e && l->next->e != e));
01445             edok = bmesh_verts_in_edge(l->v, l->next->v, ne);
01446             BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01447             BMESH_ASSERT(l->v != l->next->v);
01448             BMESH_ASSERT(l->e != l->next->e);
01449 
01450             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l);
01451             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->v);
01452             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->e);
01453             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->f);
01454         }
01455     }
01456 
01457     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(ne);
01458     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(nv);
01459     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(ov);
01460     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(e);
01461     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(tv);
01462 
01463     if (r_e) *r_e = ne;
01464     return nv;
01465 }
01466 
01496 BMEdge *bmesh_jekv(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *ke, BMVert *kv, const short check_edge_double)
01497 {
01498     BMEdge *oe;
01499     BMVert *ov, *tv;
01500     BMLoop *killoop, *l;
01501     int len, radlen = 0, halt = 0, i, valence1, valence2, edok;
01502 
01503     if (bmesh_vert_in_edge(ke, kv) == 0) {
01504         return NULL;
01505     }
01506 
01507     len = bmesh_disk_count(kv);
01508     
01509     if (len == 2) {
01510         oe = bmesh_disk_edge_next(ke, kv);
01511         tv = bmesh_edge_other_vert_get(ke, kv);
01512         ov = bmesh_edge_other_vert_get(oe, kv);
01513         halt = bmesh_verts_in_edge(kv, tv, oe); /* check for double edge */
01514         
01515         if (halt) {
01516             return NULL;
01517         }
01518         else {
01519             BMEdge *e_splice;
01520 
01521             /* For verification later, count valence of ov and t */
01522             valence1 = bmesh_disk_count(ov);
01523             valence2 = bmesh_disk_count(tv);
01524 
01525             if (check_edge_double) {
01526                 e_splice = BM_edge_exists(tv, ov);
01527             }
01528 
01529             /* remove oe from kv's disk cycle */
01530             bmesh_disk_edge_remove(oe, kv);
01531             /* relink oe->kv to be oe->tv */
01532             bmesh_edge_swapverts(oe, kv, tv);
01533             /* append oe to tv's disk cycle */
01534             bmesh_disk_edge_append(oe, tv);
01535             /* remove ke from tv's disk cycle */
01536             bmesh_disk_edge_remove(ke, tv);
01537 
01538             /* deal with radial cycle of ke */
01539             radlen = bmesh_radial_length(ke->l);
01540             if (ke->l) {
01541                 /* first step, fix the neighboring loops of all loops in ke's radial cycle */
01542                 for (i = 0, killoop = ke->l; i < radlen; i++, killoop = killoop->radial_next) {
01543                     /* relink loops and fix vertex pointer */
01544                     if (killoop->next->v == kv) {
01545                         killoop->next->v = tv;
01546                     }
01547 
01548                     killoop->next->prev = killoop->prev;
01549                     killoop->prev->next = killoop->next;
01550                     if (BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(killoop->f) == killoop) {
01551                         BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(killoop->f) = killoop->next;
01552                     }
01553                     killoop->next = NULL;
01554                     killoop->prev = NULL;
01555 
01556                     /* fix len attribute of face */
01557                     killoop->f->len--;
01558                 }
01559                 /* second step, remove all the hanging loops attached to ke */
01560                 radlen = bmesh_radial_length(ke->l);
01561 
01562                 if (LIKELY(radlen)) {
01563                     BMLoop **loops = NULL;
01564                     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(loops, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, radlen, __func__);
01565 
01566                     killoop = ke->l;
01567 
01568                     /* this should be wrapped into a bme_free_radial function to be used by bmesh_KF as well... */
01569                     for (i = 0; i < radlen; i++) {
01570                         loops[i] = killoop;
01571                         killoop = killoop->radial_next;
01572                     }
01573                     for (i = 0; i < radlen; i++) {
01574                         bm->totloop--;
01575                         BLI_mempool_free(bm->lpool, loops[i]);
01576                     }
01577                     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(loops);
01578                 }
01579 
01580                 /* Validate radial cycle of oe */
01581                 edok = bmesh_radial_validate(radlen, oe->l);
01582                 BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01583             }
01584 
01585             /* deallocate edg */
01586             bm_kill_only_edge(bm, ke);
01587 
01588             /* deallocate verte */
01589             bm_kill_only_vert(bm, kv);
01590 
01591             /* Validate disk cycle lengths of ov, tv are unchanged */
01592             edok = bmesh_disk_validate(valence1, ov->e, ov);
01593             BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01594             edok = bmesh_disk_validate(valence2, tv->e, tv);
01595             BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01596 
01597             /* Validate loop cycle of all faces attached to oe */
01598             for (i = 0, l = oe->l; i < radlen; i++, l = l->radial_next) {
01599                 BMESH_ASSERT(l->e == oe);
01600                 edok = bmesh_verts_in_edge(l->v, l->next->v, oe);
01601                 BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01602                 edok = bmesh_loop_validate(l->f);
01603                 BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01604 
01605                 BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l);
01606                 BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->v);
01607                 BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->e);
01608                 BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(l->f);
01609             }
01610 
01611             if (check_edge_double) {
01612                 if (e_splice) {
01613                     /* removes e_splice */
01614                     BM_edge_splice(bm, e_splice, oe);
01615                 }
01616             }
01617 
01618             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(ov);
01619             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(tv);
01620             BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(oe);
01621 
01622             return oe;
01623         }
01624     }
01625     return NULL;
01626 }
01627 
01658 BMFace *bmesh_jfke(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f1, BMFace *f2, BMEdge *e)
01659 {
01660     BMLoop *l_iter, *f1loop = NULL, *f2loop = NULL;
01661     int newlen = 0, i, f1len = 0, f2len = 0, edok;
01662 
01663     /* can't join a face to itself */
01664     if (f1 == f2) {
01665         return NULL;
01666     }
01667 
01668     /* validate that edge is 2-manifold edge */
01669     if (!BM_edge_is_manifold(e)) {
01670         return NULL;
01671     }
01672 
01673     /* verify that e is in both f1 and f2 */
01674     f1len = f1->len;
01675     f2len = f2->len;
01676 
01677     if (!((f1loop = BM_face_edge_share_loop(f1, e)) &&
01678           (f2loop = BM_face_edge_share_loop(f2, e))))
01679     {
01680         return NULL;
01681     }
01682 
01683     /* validate direction of f2's loop cycle is compatible */
01684     if (f1loop->v == f2loop->v) {
01685         return NULL;
01686     }
01687 
01688     /* validate that for each face, each vertex has another edge in its disk cycle that is
01689      * not e, and not shared. */
01690     if (bmesh_radial_face_find(f1loop->next->e, f2) ||
01691         bmesh_radial_face_find(f1loop->prev->e, f2) ||
01692         bmesh_radial_face_find(f2loop->next->e, f1) ||
01693         bmesh_radial_face_find(f2loop->prev->e, f1) )
01694     {
01695         return NULL;
01696     }
01697 
01698     /* validate only one shared edge */
01699     if (BM_face_share_edge_count(f1, f2) > 1) {
01700         return NULL;
01701     }
01702 
01703     /* validate no internal join */
01704     for (i = 0, l_iter = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f1); i < f1len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next) {
01705         BM_elem_flag_disable(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
01706     }
01707     for (i = 0, l_iter = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f2); i < f2len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next) {
01708         BM_elem_flag_disable(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
01709     }
01710 
01711     for (i = 0, l_iter = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f1); i < f1len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next) {
01712         if (l_iter != f1loop) {
01713             BM_elem_flag_enable(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
01714         }
01715     }
01716     for (i = 0, l_iter = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f2); i < f2len; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next) {
01717         if (l_iter != f2loop) {
01718             /* as soon as a duplicate is found, bail out */
01719             if (BM_elem_flag_test(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG)) {
01720                 return NULL;
01721             }
01722         }
01723     }
01724 
01725     /* join the two loop */
01726     f1loop->prev->next = f2loop->next;
01727     f2loop->next->prev = f1loop->prev;
01728     
01729     f1loop->next->prev = f2loop->prev;
01730     f2loop->prev->next = f1loop->next;
01731     
01732     /* if f1loop was baseloop, make f1loop->next the base. */
01733     if (BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f1) == f1loop)
01734         BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f1) = f1loop->next;
01735 
01736     /* increase length of f1 */
01737     f1->len += (f2->len - 2);
01738 
01739     /* make sure each loop points to the proper face */
01740     newlen = f1->len;
01741     for (i = 0, l_iter = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f1); i < newlen; i++, l_iter = l_iter->next)
01742         l_iter->f = f1;
01743     
01744     /* remove edge from the disk cycle of its two vertices */
01745     bmesh_disk_edge_remove(f1loop->e, f1loop->e->v1);
01746     bmesh_disk_edge_remove(f1loop->e, f1loop->e->v2);
01747     
01748     /* deallocate edge and its two loops as well as f2 */
01749     BLI_mempool_free(bm->toolflagpool, f1loop->e->oflags);
01750     BLI_mempool_free(bm->epool, f1loop->e);
01751     bm->totedge--;
01752     BLI_mempool_free(bm->lpool, f1loop);
01753     bm->totloop--;
01754     BLI_mempool_free(bm->lpool, f2loop);
01755     bm->totloop--;
01756     BLI_mempool_free(bm->toolflagpool, f2->oflags);
01757     BLI_mempool_free(bm->fpool, f2);
01758     bm->totface--;
01759     /* account for both above */
01760     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_EDGE | BM_FACE;
01761 
01762     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(f1);
01763 
01764     /* validate the new loop cycle */
01765     edok = bmesh_loop_validate(f1);
01766     BMESH_ASSERT(edok != FALSE);
01767     
01768     return f1;
01769 }
01770 
01778 int BM_vert_splice(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v, BMVert *vtarget)
01779 {
01780     BMEdge *e;
01781     BMLoop *l;
01782     BMIter liter;
01783 
01784     /* verts already spliced */
01785     if (v == vtarget) {
01786         return FALSE;
01787     }
01788 
01789     /* retarget all the loops of v to vtarget */
01790     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
01791         l->v = vtarget;
01792     }
01793 
01794     /* move all the edges from v's disk to vtarget's disk */
01795     while ((e = v->e)) {
01796         bmesh_disk_edge_remove(e, v);
01797         bmesh_edge_swapverts(e, v, vtarget);
01798         bmesh_disk_edge_append(e, vtarget);
01799     }
01800 
01801     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(v);
01802     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(vtarget);
01803 
01804     /* v is unused now, and can be killed */
01805     BM_vert_kill(bm, v);
01806 
01807     return TRUE;
01808 }
01809 
01821 int bmesh_vert_separate(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v, BMVert ***r_vout, int *r_vout_len)
01822 {
01823     BMEdge **stack = NULL;
01824     BLI_array_declare(stack);
01825     BMVert **verts = NULL;
01826     GHash *visithash;
01827     BMIter eiter, liter;
01828     BMLoop *l;
01829     BMEdge *e;
01830     int i, maxindex;
01831     BMLoop *nl;
01832 
01833     visithash = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, __func__);
01834 
01835     maxindex = 0;
01836     BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01837         if (BLI_ghash_haskey(visithash, e)) {
01838             continue;
01839         }
01840 
01841         /* Prime the stack with this unvisited edge */
01842         BLI_array_append(stack, e);
01843 
01844         /* Considering only edges and faces incident on vertex v, walk
01845          * the edges & faces and assign an index to each connected set */
01846         while ((e = BLI_array_pop(stack))) {
01847             BLI_ghash_insert(visithash, e, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(maxindex));
01848 
01849             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, e, BM_LOOPS_OF_EDGE) {
01850                 nl = (l->v == v) ? l->prev : l->next;
01851                 if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(visithash, nl->e)) {
01852                     BLI_array_append(stack, nl->e);
01853                 }
01854             }
01855         }
01856 
01857         maxindex++;
01858     }
01859 
01860     /* Make enough verts to split v for each group */
01861     verts = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BMVert *) * maxindex, __func__);
01862     verts[0] = v;
01863     for (i = 1; i < maxindex; i++) {
01864         verts[i] = BM_vert_create(bm, v->co, v);
01865     }
01866 
01867     /* Replace v with the new verts in each group */
01868 #if 0
01869     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
01870         /* call first since its faster then a hash lookup */
01871         if (l->v != v) {
01872             continue;
01873         }
01874         i = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(visithash, l->e));
01875         if (i == 0) {
01876             continue;
01877         }
01878 
01879         /* Loops here should always refer to an edge that has v as an
01880          * endpoint. For each appearance of this vert in a face, there
01881          * will actually be two iterations: one for the loop heading
01882          * towards vertex v, and another for the loop heading out from
01883          * vertex v. Only need to swap the vertex on one of those times,
01884          * on the outgoing loop. */
01885 
01886         /* XXX - because this clobbers the iterator, this *whole* block is commented, see below */
01887         l->v = verts[i];
01888     }
01889 #else
01890     /* note: this is the same as the commented code above *except* that it doesn't break iterator
01891      * by modifying data it loops over [#30632], this re-uses the 'stack' variable which is a bit
01892      * bad practice but save alloc'ing a new array - note, the comment above is useful, keep it
01893      * if you are tidying up code - campbell */
01894     BLI_array_empty(stack);
01895     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
01896         if (l->v == v) {
01897             BLI_array_append(stack, (BMEdge *)l);
01898         }
01899     }
01900     while ((l = (BMLoop *)(BLI_array_pop(stack)))) {
01901         if ((i = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(visithash, l->e)))) {
01902             l->v = verts[i];
01903         }
01904     }
01905 #endif
01906 
01907     BLI_array_free(stack);
01908 
01909     BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01910         i = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(visithash, e));
01911         if (i == 0) {
01912             continue;
01913         }
01914 
01915         BLI_assert(e->v1 == v || e->v2 == v);
01916         bmesh_disk_edge_remove(e, v);
01917         bmesh_edge_swapverts(e, v, verts[i]);
01918         bmesh_disk_edge_append(e, verts[i]);
01919     }
01920 
01921     BLI_ghash_free(visithash, NULL, NULL);
01922 
01923     for (i = 0; i < maxindex; i++) {
01924         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(verts[i]);
01925     }
01926 
01927     if (r_vout_len != NULL) {
01928         *r_vout_len = maxindex;
01929     }
01930 
01931     if (r_vout != NULL) {
01932         *r_vout = verts;
01933     }
01934     else {
01935         MEM_freeN(verts);
01936     }
01937 
01938     return TRUE;
01939 }
01940 
01944 int BM_vert_separate(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v, BMVert ***r_vout, int *r_vout_len,
01945                      BMEdge **e_in, int e_in_len)
01946 {
01947     int i;
01948 
01949     for (i = 0; i < e_in_len; i++) {
01950         BMEdge *e = e_in[i];
01951         if (e->l && BM_vert_in_edge(e, v)) {
01952             bmesh_edge_separate(bm, e, e->l);
01953         }
01954     }
01955 
01956     return bmesh_vert_separate(bm, v, r_vout, r_vout_len);
01957 }
01958 
01968 int BM_edge_splice(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *e, BMEdge *etarget)
01969 {
01970     BMLoop *l;
01971 
01972     if (!BM_vert_in_edge(e, etarget->v1) || !BM_vert_in_edge(e, etarget->v2)) {
01973         /* not the same vertices can't splice */
01974         return FALSE;
01975     }
01976 
01977     while (e->l) {
01978         l = e->l;
01979         BLI_assert(BM_vert_in_edge(etarget, l->v));
01980         BLI_assert(BM_vert_in_edge(etarget, l->next->v));
01981         bmesh_radial_loop_remove(l, e);
01982         bmesh_radial_append(etarget, l);
01983     }
01984 
01985     BLI_assert(bmesh_radial_length(e->l) == 0);
01986 
01987     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(e);
01988     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(etarget);
01989 
01990     /* removes from disks too */
01991     BM_edge_kill(bm, e);
01992 
01993     return TRUE;
01994 }
01995 
02007 int bmesh_edge_separate(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *e, BMLoop *l_sep)
02008 {
02009     BMEdge *ne;
02010     int radlen;
02011 
02012     BLI_assert(l_sep->e == e);
02013     BLI_assert(e->l);
02014     
02015     radlen = bmesh_radial_length(e->l);
02016     if (radlen < 2) {
02017         /* no cut required */
02018         return TRUE;
02019     }
02020 
02021     if (l_sep == e->l) {
02022         e->l = l_sep->radial_next;
02023     }
02024 
02025     ne = BM_edge_create(bm, e->v1, e->v2, e, FALSE);
02026     bmesh_radial_loop_remove(l_sep, e);
02027     bmesh_radial_append(ne, l_sep);
02028     l_sep->e = ne;
02029 
02030     BLI_assert(bmesh_radial_length(e->l) == radlen - 1);
02031     BLI_assert(bmesh_radial_length(ne->l) == 1);
02032 
02033     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(ne);
02034     BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(e);
02035 
02036     return TRUE;
02037 }
02038 
02046 BMVert *bmesh_urmv_loop(BMesh *bm, BMLoop *sl)
02047 {
02048     BMVert **vtar;
02049     int len, i;
02050     BMVert *nv = NULL;
02051     BMVert *sv = sl->v;
02052 
02053     /* peel the face from the edge radials on both sides of the
02054      * loop vert, disconnecting the face from its fan */
02055     bmesh_edge_separate(bm, sl->e, sl);
02056     bmesh_edge_separate(bm, sl->prev->e, sl->prev);
02057 
02058     if (bmesh_disk_count(sv) == 2) {
02059         /* If there are still only two edges out of sv, then
02060          * this whole URMV was just a no-op, so exit now. */
02061         return sv;
02062     }
02063 
02064     /* Update the disk start, so that v->e points to an edge
02065      * not touching the split loop. This is so that BM_vert_split
02066      * will leave the original sv on some *other* fan (not the
02067      * one-face fan that holds the unglue face). */
02068     while (sv->e == sl->e || sv->e == sl->prev->e) {
02069         sv->e = bmesh_disk_edge_next(sv->e, sv);
02070     }
02071 
02072     /* Split all fans connected to the vert, duplicating it for
02073      * each fans. */
02074     bmesh_vert_separate(bm, sv, &vtar, &len);
02075 
02076     /* There should have been at least two fans cut apart here,
02077      * otherwise the early exit would have kicked in. */
02078     BLI_assert(len >= 2);
02079 
02080     nv = sl->v;
02081 
02082     /* Desired result here is that a new vert should always be
02083      * created for the unglue face. This is so we can glue any
02084      * extras back into the original vert. */
02085     BLI_assert(nv != sv);
02086     BLI_assert(sv == vtar[0]);
02087 
02088     /* If there are more than two verts as a result, glue together
02089      * all the verts except the one this URMV intended to create */
02090     if (len > 2) {
02091         for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
02092             if (vtar[i] == nv) {
02093                 break;
02094             }
02095         }
02096 
02097         if (i != len) {
02098             /* Swap the single vert that was needed for the
02099              * unglue into the last array slot */
02100             SWAP(BMVert *, vtar[i], vtar[len - 1]);
02101 
02102             /* And then glue the rest back together */
02103             for (i = 1; i < len - 1; i++) {
02104                 BM_vert_splice(bm, vtar[i], vtar[0]);
02105             }
02106         }
02107     }
02108 
02109     MEM_freeN(vtar);
02110 
02111     return nv;
02112 }
02113 
02121 BMVert *bmesh_urmv(BMesh *bm, BMFace *sf, BMVert *sv)
02122 {
02123     BMLoop *l = BM_face_vert_share_loop(sf, sv);
02124     return bmesh_urmv_loop(bm, l);
02125 }
